title: Contamination by microplastics and sorbed organic pollutants in the surface waters of the Tietê River, São Paulo-SP, Brazil
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Nicoli Gomes de Moraes, Glaucia Peregrina Olivatto, Felipe Machado de Oliveira Lourenço, Ana Laura Athayde Lourenço, Gustavo Munhoz Garcia, Rodrigo Floriano Pimpinato, Valdemar Luiz Tornisielo
